Package it.polimi.ingsw.network

Class AdrenalineClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.network.AdrenalineClient
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AdrenalineClientRMI, AdrenalineClientSocket
    public abstract class AdrenalineClient
extends java.lang.Object
    Class used by client for communication with server. It's abstract because it needs to be implemented once user has decided whether they want Socket based or RMI based communication. This class contains all methods used to communicate user's choices to server.

    • Field Detail

      • view

        protected View view
        Reference to the class that communicates with the user

      • bottleneck

        protected Bottleneck bottleneck
        Reference to an "Exception's bottleneck". All methods that can throw a fatal exception have to pass through the tryDO function of this class. If an exception is thrown then an event is invoked: onExceptionGenerated is the event-handler and the Exception is the event-arg

      • logger

        private static final java.util.logging.Logger logger

      • PING_PERIOD

        protected static final int PING_PERIOD
        Time interval in milliseconds that elapse between two attempts of pinging the server
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Constructor Detail

      • AdrenalineClient

        public AdrenalineClient​(View view)
        Sets all parameters to input values. Also signs up to bottleneck event, which triggers when connection is lost.
        Parameters:
        view - Reference to the interface which communicates with the user

    • Method Detail

      • onExceptionGenerated

        protected void onExceptionGenerated​(java.lang.Exception exception)
        Handle all the exceptions of the class. if this method is invoked, then the server is unreachable.
        Parameters:
        exception - the specific current exception.

      • setupView

        protected void setupView()
        Signs up to name, color, game length, map type and new command events. Once an event triggers, this class communicates user's choice to server

      • start

        public void start()
           throws java.io.IOException,
                  java.rmi.NotBoundException
        Connects to server using the global parameters. Also starts login method, which displays the intro to the user
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        java.rmi.NotBoundException

      • startPing

        protected abstract void startPing()
        Starts the pinging routine

      • connect

        protected abstract void connect()
                         throws java.io.IOException,
                                java.rmi.NotBoundException
        Starts a communication with the server using the global parameters, namely port and server string.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        java.rmi.NotBoundException

      • notifyName

        protected void notifyName​(java.lang.String name)
        Communicates to server user's name of choice, once the event has been triggered
        Parameters:
        name - Name chosen by the user

      • notifyColor

        private void notifyColor​(int colorIndex)
        Communicates to server user's color of choice, once the event has been triggered. Color is communicated through a number.
        Parameters:
        colorIndex - number that represents color chosen by the user.

      • notifyGameLength

        private void notifyGameLength​(int gameLength)
        Communicates to server user's game length of choice, once the event has been triggered.
        Parameters:
        gameLength - Number that represents how many skulls the user wants to have in the game.

      • notifyGameMap

        private void notifyGameMap​(int gameMap)
        Communicates to server user's map type of choice, once the event has been triggered.
        Parameters:
        gameMap - Number that represents which map the user has chosen among the 4 possible ones.

      • notifyActionCommand

        private void notifyActionCommand​(Command<RemoteActionsHandler> command)
        Notifies the server about a new command. This kind of command is used in the action phase of the game and it's used to modify the model.
        Parameters:
        command - Command to be sent.

      • notifyServerCommand

        protected void notifyServerCommand​(Command<IAdrenalineServer> command)
        Sends to server a new command. This is the only way client communicates with server
        Parameters:
        command - Command to be sent.

      • sendServerCommand

        protected abstract void sendServerCommand​(Command<IAdrenalineServer> command)
                                   throws java.io.IOException
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • newViewCommand

        public void newViewCommand​(Command<View> command)
        Invoked when a new View-command is received by the Server. That kind of command is used by server to invoke methods of the Client's view
        Parameters:
        command - Command received.

      • stopPing

        protected abstract void stopPing()
        Stops the pinging routine
